titleStmt.title: The pathvvay to prayer and pietie Containing, 1 An exposition of the Lords Prayer, with an apologie for publicke, and priuate set prayer. 2 A preparation to the Lords Supper, with Ma. Zanchius confession, confirming that sacrament. 3 A direction to a Christian life, both in our generall and particular callings. 4 An instruction to die well, and a consolation against all crosses. With diuers prayers, and thanksgiuings fit for this treatise. By Robert Hill, Doctor in Diuinitie.
Christs prayer expounded, a Christian directed, and a communicant prepared
titleStmt.author: Hill, Robert, d. 1623.
Zanchi, Girolamo, 1516-1590.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. S[tansby] for Edward Blount, and William Barret,

notesStmt.note: Originally published in 1606 as: Christs prayer expounded, a Christian directed, and a communicant prepared.
"A communicant instructed", "A direction to liue well", and "A direction to die well" have separately dated title pages; signatures continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
